= Components =

|| *Component Code* || *Component Name* || *Type* || *Function* || *Comments* ||
|| *SCA.SC.LCV* || Lateral Cervical Nucleus || || Relay Low-threshold Mechanoreceptors to CR || from Lamina V ||
|| *SCA.SC.LSN* || Lateral Spinal Nucleus || || Integrate autonomic and homeostatic functions || Projects to HT and lateral globus pallidus ||
|| *SCA.SC.MG* || Marginal Nucleus || || Relay information related to pain and temperature sensation || Pain sensation cannot be modulated ||
|| *SCA.SC.SG* || Substantia Gelatinosa || || Relay for C-fibers of slowly conducting, poorly localized pain sensation || Second of two after proprius 1-order neurons ||
|| *SCA.SC.NP* || Proprius Nucleus || || Relay light touch, pain and temperature information || With Clarke's Nucleus sensing fine touch and proprioception ||
|| *SCA.SC.CCV* || Central Cervical Nucleus || || Coordinate voluntary movements, maintain balance, and learn motor skills || Receive neck and vestibular input and project to CR and vestibular nuclei ||
|| *SCA.SC.RPL* || Retroposteriolateral Nucleus || || Innervation of limbs muscles || ||
|| *SCA.SC.IML* || Intermediolateral Nucleus || || Mediate entire sympathetic innervation of body || from Lamina VII ||
|| *SCA.SC.IMM* || Intermediomedial Nucleus || || Preganglionic sympathetic fibers || ||
|| *SCA.SC.SPCR* || Sacral Precerebellar Nucleus || || Relay unconscious proprioception, motor feedback to CR || Lower extremity and trunk, relay motor feedback to CR ||
|| *SCA.SC.CBS* || Centrobasalis Nucleus || || Unconscious proprioception to CR || Upper extremity, relay motor feedback to CR ||
|| *SCA.SC.PM* || Posteromedial Nucleus || || Innervation of trunk muscles || Upper and lower ||
|| *SCA.SC.MM* || Medial Motor Nucleus || || Innervation of trunk muscles || Upper and lower ||
|| *SCA.SC.PL* || Posterolateral Nucleus || || Innervation of limb muscles || Upper and lower ||
|| *SCA.SC.LM* || Lateral Motor Nucleus || || Innervation of limb muscles || Upper and lower ||
|| *SCA.SC.PHR* || Phrenic Nucleus || || Innervation of diaphragm || Projections from Nucleus Solitarius ||
|| *SCA.SC.DCN* || Dorsal Commisural Nucleus || || Relay of sensory information from pelvic viscera || Includes nociception ||
